description: To address the identified issue with Microsoft Edge (Chromium-based), users are advised to apply the update corresponding to build version 119.0.2151.58 released on November 9, 2023. This update includes important security enhancements that mitigate the risk of privilege escalation. Users on the Extended Stable version should also update to 118.0.2088.102. Upgrade packages are available through the Microsoft Update Catalog, specifically referenced by KB article KB-119.0.2151.58. It is crucial that all users promptly install this update to ensure continued protection over their browsing environment.
